entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. Temperature steady near 19.
entry.summary: Showers ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature steady near 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
